name: CANINE 49
description:
This prompt was sent through the Rainbow Connection - a wish granting organization located in Michigan. The original author of the concept is Nathan Stewart, an 18-year-old who was brought in to contact with the NHTV through the Rainbow Connection. 

If you're interested in more information about the Rainbow Connection, check them out here.
